attributes.action: stop the handout of taxpayer pounds to our banks and other financial organisations until they give a binding assurance that NOBODY in those organisations is going to receive any bonuses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everybody with eyes and a brain can see that using taxpayer guarantees to fund huge bonuses is EXACTLY what was predicted would happen.  It must be stopped before the country is brought completely to its knees by this crass stupidity on the part of our government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
